item.title: By: Hardeywarlex

item.description:
In reply to <a href="/uae-paypal-account/#comment-2280">Benpha</a>.
Africard is a visa card
item.content:encoded:

Africard is a visa card

item.title: By: Benpha

item.description: Is it a must my Africard should be master card or just visa card
item.content:encoded: Is it a must my Africard should be master card or just visa card

item.title: By: Hardeywarlex
item.dc:creator: Hardeywarlex
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/uae-paypal-account/#comment-2277">Benpha</a>.
No charges, you withdraw with bank rate using Africard
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Benpha.

No charges, you withdraw with bank rate using Africard

item.title: By: Benpha

item.title: By: Benpha

item.description: Will be able to convert the usd to naira through Africard which I will later withdraw to my local bank?
